about.title: About Us
about.text: We are motivated by more than the simple pursuit of business success. We aim to make the world sustainable and better than it was before. We aim to improve the lives of millions of people worldwide and make the process of following/conducting therapy more comfortable for both patients and doctors.
about.signature: With the highest consideration from the A2 Research and Development lab
about.name: Aleksey A. ROMANOV

activities.title: Our activities
activities.text: We work in various fields using our background to solve industrial, environmental challenges and various issues.
list: Spatial analysis (geographic information technology and remote sensing)

analytics.title: Help companies
analytics.text: Our analytics, cutting edge reviews and models help companies from the energy, industrial, medical, financial, insurance and other sectors improve their ESG strategies and development programs based on up-to-date reviews (scientific reports, intellectual property studies, publications)

solutions.title: About products
solutions.text: Our solutions facilitate routine procedures and enhance security through user-friendly software assistants and a wide network of partners from various sectors.

assistant.title: Medical assistants
assistant.text: We also offer user-friendly interfaces of personal medical assistants for those who live without the need for therapeutic support but want to increase the level of protection for themselves and their loved ones through a personalized profile.

businessModel.title: Business model
businessModel.text: The basis of the business model is the expansion of the network of partners, providing the exchange of analytical materials and data for the sustainable support of our customers (medical sector, insurance companies and banks, service, tourism, airlines).

projects.title: Our projects
projects.label: We provide analytics, cutting-edge reviews, and models to optimize the operating companies processes concerning industry specifics, focusing on the best available and future-oriented solutions considering ESG and SDG trends.

airflow.title: Airflow and tracking pollutant emissions modelling
airflow.text: Computational modelling for pollutant tracking in complex urban terrains, evaluating the contributions of sources. Our models precisely count the influence of meteorological factors and landscape; we work with 40 by 40 km areas and have a positive experience with modelling up to 3 km above the ground

transport.title: Transport systems modelling
transport.text: Railway complexes and autonomous transport simulation modelling for the quarries and port infrastructure. Through computational modelling, we provide an audit and selection of optimal solutions for the modernization of the road infrastructure of quarries in order to reduce negative environmental and economic costs.

trends.title: Trends analysis
trends.text: Review of modern trends and promising projects focused on global sustainable development challenges. We prepare analytics based on preliminary and thematic processing of satellite data, industrial databases, corporate reports, scientific publications, and targeted computational modelling for consumers.

locomotives.title: Energy transition modelling
locomotives.text: Comparative modelling of the transfer of open-pit mine diesel locomotives to all-electric traction based on lithium batteries.
locomotives.note: (zero on-site emissions; especially relevant for the markets of Asia and Oceania)

wm.title: Wellness Monitor
wm.previewText: Intelligent assistant to support the quality of life
wm.smallText: Intelligent assistant to support the quality of life, which allows for tracking the status of key health indicators and therapeutic protocols and support for people with special needs.
wm.text:
<0>Wellness Monitor</0> – intelligent assistant to support the quality of life, which allows for tracking the status of key health indicators and therapeutic protocols and support for people with special needs. 
The assistant is designed to support and accompany users and maintain communication with doctors, medical services, insurance, and other companies. You just need to register to use the assistant, which takes less than a minute. This assistant helps you monitor your health indicators, plan your treatment, nutrition, and medication program, and communicate with other users. 
Wellness Monitor is a part of the x-Health&Wellness framework – an interface for interaction with the medical sector (hospitals), insurance companies, airlines, and travel services. Our goal is to develop and maintain Wellness Monitor as a convenient intelligent assistant that provides a safe, fast, and reliable service of equal opportunities for all categories of users.

framework.title: x-Health&Wellness framework
framework.previewText: An ecosystem that brings together various services
framework.smallText: An ecosystem that brings together various services to make the life of users as productive as possible, freeing up time from worries for constant monitoring of health indicators and medical services
framework.text:
The x-Health&Wellness framework is a specially developed ecosystem that combines various services (medicine, insurance, banks, tourism, air travel, restaurants) to make the users’ life most productive, freeing up time from worries for constant monitoring of health parameters and medical therapy. 
The x-Health&Wellness framework provides constant communication with the supervising doctor and the medical centre, allows you to safely travel to new countries, be confident in medical control and personalized support from medical services, restaurant services, and many others. User data is securely stored in the registry in encrypted form and is only accessible through authorized access to personalize therapy or diet and in the event of a sudden emergency.

airflows.title: Urban airflows modeling
airflows.previewText: Modeling of air flows and estimation of pollutant concentrations
airflows.smallText: Modeling of surface air flows and estimation of pollutant concentrations based on Lagrangian mathematics
airflows.text:
<0>Surface airflows modeling and pollutant concentrations estimation</0> are very complex processes requiring the development of unique mathematical models that consider regional features and many other factors. We use the best approaches to model and evaluate the negative impact of pollutants on the environment and public health by tracking them from the source to a specific point in space. 
The core of our solution is Lagrangian mathematics; technical solutions are implemented based on Python, C++, PostgreSQL, QGIS. We are ready to implement our solutions in the information environment of your company.

publications.title: Our publications
publications.label: We are open to collaborating with investment companies and the research community, so some of our study results have already been published in scientific journals. Others are submitted for peer review.

item.forest: Catastrophic Pm2.5 emissions from Siberian Forest Fires: Impacting Factors Analysis
item.gral: Graz Lagrangian Model (GRAL) for Pollutants Tracking and Estimating Sources Partial Contributions to Atmospheric Pollution in Highly Urbanized Areas
item.electricity_transition: Environmental Efficiency of the Fossil Fuels to Electricity Transition in Eastern Siberia Cities
item.carbon_emission_russian_forest: Reassessment of carbon emissions from fires and a new estimate of net carbon uptake in Russian forests in 2001–2021

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.label: Please fill out the form to ask questions or discuss a possible collaboration. We will reply as soon as possible
feedback.fail: An error occurred while sending. Please try again later

about.title: Multiagent modeling
texts: We use multi-agent modeling to analyze urban mobility and road traffic. This allows us to simulate and analyze the movement of vehicles and pedestrians within an entire city.
The results of these simulations are used in other solutions, from the analysis of infrastructure projects to the assessment of the effects of pollutant emissions.

analysis.title: Multicriteria analysis
texts: We take into account many parameters of urban infrastructure and vehicles to increase the reliability of modeling and bring the simulated situation closer to the real one.
The distribution of agents and their movements are close to the real movements of road and pedestrian traffic participants.
This ensures the relevance and reliability of our analytics.

payload.title: Payload of Results
payload.texts: We reuse the results of multi-agent simulations in our other projects due to the extensive data set of these results. So, for example, taking into account the additional parameter of the volume of vehicle emissions allows us to analyze environmental situations and the spread of pollutants using Lagrangian mathematics and mathematical packages GRAM/GRAL.

capabilities.title: Capabilities
capabilities.text: Multi-agent modeling ensures the reliability of the simulation through features such as:
list: Distribution of agents based on multicriteria analysis of the parameters of buildings and areas
Accounting for 'points of interest' in the urban environment such as shopping malls and other public buildings
Accounting for behavior scenarios and parameters of each agent
Accounting for the interaction of agents with each other and with infrastructure objects

projects.text: Projects in which we applied multi-agent modeling

about.title: Particle Distribution Modeling
texts: We apply particle propagation modeling in environmental projects to take into account the modeling and prediction of the distribution of pollutants in the surface layers of the atmosphere.

tools.title: What do we use
texts: To model the propagation of particles, we use Lagrangian mathematics and mathematical packages GRAM/GRAL.
These solutions allow us to take into account and predict the movement of each particle of a particular substance in the simulation area.

capabilities.title: Capabilities
capabilities.text: Particle propagation simulation allows us to:
list: Simulate the spread of pollutants in the atmosphere
Conduct retrospective forecasts to validate mathematical models
Predict particle propagation in the future
Assess the impact and contribution of each emission source
Assess the influence and contribution of enterprises and source groups

projects.text: Projects where we applied particle distribution
